import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Nav, NavItem, Row ,Container, Col, NavLink } from 'reactstrap'; const Signup = (props) => { const [dropdownOpen, setDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const [step , setStep]= useState(1); const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [phone , setPhone]= useState(''); const [email, setEmail]= useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [password2, setPassword2] = useState(''); const [registerType, setRegisterType] = useState(''); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [errors, setErr] = useState([]) const toggle = () => setDropdownOpen(!dropdownOpen); const onSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); } const validate = ()=>{ const not_name= (!name?setErr(...errors, "Please enter name"):null); const not_password= (!password?setErr(...errors, "Please enter password "):null); const not_email= (!email?setErr(...errors, "Please enter email"):null); const not_match= ( password2===password? setErr(...errors,"Password does not match"):null); console.log(not_email, not_match, not_name, not_password) } return (
setStep(1)} className={step===1? 'active bg-primary':'inactive'} >Step 1 {name && email && password ?setStep(2):setErr(...errors,"Please fill all fields") console.log({name, password, email, password}) }} className={step===2? 'active bg-primary':'inactive'} >Step 2
{ step===1?
{ errors? errors.map((error)=>{ return(
{error}
) }) :null }
onSubmit} className="form">
setName(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Enter full name" className="form-control" name="name"/>
setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter email" className="form-control" name="email"/>
setPassword(e.target.value)} type="password" placeholder="Enter password" className="form-control" name="password"/>
setPassword2(e.target.value)} type="password" placeholder="Confirm password" className="form-control" name="password2"/>
:null } { step===2?
Please enter all fields
setPhone(e.target.value)} type="telephone" placeholder="Enter your phone number" className="form-control" name="phone_number"/>
setRegisterType(e.target.value)} name="select" type="radio" value="leader"/>Register as a leader setRegisterType(e.target.value)} name="select" type="radio" value="market"/>Register for E-market
: null }
); } export default Signup;
